name: Albus Dumbledore
line: I should have known that you would be here, Professor McGonagall.

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: Good evening, Professor Dumbledore. Are the rumours true Albus?

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: I'm afraid so, Professor. The good, and the bad.

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: And the boy?

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Hagrid is bringing him.

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: Do you think it wise to trust Hagrid with something as important as this?

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Ah, Professor, I would trust Hagrid with my life.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Professor Dumbledore, Sir. Professor McGonagall.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: No problems, I trust, Hagrid?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: No, Sir. Little tyke fell asleep just as we were flying over Bristol. Heh.Try not to wake him. There you go.

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: Albus, do you really think it's safe, leaving him with these people? I've watched them all day. They're the worst sort of Muggles imaginable. They really are…

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: The only family he has.

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: This boy will be famous. There won't be a child in our world who doesn't know his name.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Exactly. He's far better off growing up away from all of that. Until he is ready.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: There there, Hagrid. It's not really goodbye, after all.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Good luck, Harry Potter.

name: Petunia Dursley
line: Up. Get up. Now!

name: Dudley Dursley
line: Wake up, cousin! We're going to the zoo!

name: Petunia Dursley
line: Oh, here he comes, the birthday boy!

name: Vernon Dursley
line: Happy birthday, son.

name: Petunia Dursley
line: Why don't you just cook the breakfast, and try not to burn anything.

name: Harry Potter
line: Yes, Aunt Petunia.

name: Petunia Dursley
line: I want everything to be perfect for my Dudley's special day.

name: Vernon Dursley
line: Hurry up! Bring my coffee, boy!

name: Harry Potter
line: Yes, Uncle Vernon.

name: Petunia Dursley
line: Aren't they wonderful, darling?

name: Dudley Dursley
line: How many are there?

name: Vernon Dursley
line: Thirty-six. Counted them myself.

name: Dudley Dursley
line: Thirty-six?! But last year, last year I had thirty-seven!

name: Vernon Dursley
line: Err yes, well, some of them are quite a bit bigger than last year.

name: Dudley Dursley
line: I don't care how big they are!

name: Petunia Dursley
line: Oh, now, now, now. This is what we're going to do, is that when we go out, we're going to buy you two new presents! How's that, pumpkin?

name: Petunia Dursley
line: This will be a lovely day at the zoo. I'm really looking forward to it.

name: Vernon Dursley
line: I'm warning you now, boy. Any funny business, any at all, and you won't have any meals for a week. Get in.

name: Dudley Dursley
line: Make it move.

name: Vernon Dursley
line: Move!

name: Dudley Dursley
line: MOVE!

name: Harry Potter
line: He's asleep!

name: Dudley Dursley
line: He's boring.

name: Harry Potter
line: Sorry about him. He doesn't understand what it's like, lying there day after day, having people press their ugly faces in on you.

name: Harry Potter
line: Can you… hear me? It's just… I've never talked to a snake before. Do you… I mean… do you talk to people often?

name: Harry Potter
line: You're from Burma, aren't you? Was it nice there, do you miss your family?

name: Harry Potter
line: I see. That's me as well. I never knew my parents, either.

name: Dudley Dursley
line: Mummy, dad, come here! You won't believe what this snake is doing!

name: Dudley Dursley
line: Whoa! Ahh! Ahh!!

name: Snake
line: Thanks.

name: Harry Potter
line: Any time.

line: Mum, mummy!

name: Petunia Dursley
line: AHH!

name: Dudley Dursley
line: Mum, help! Help me!

name: Petunia Dursley
line: My darling boy! How did you get in there?! How did you get in there? Dursley, oh, Dursley!

name: Petunia Dursley
line: It's all right, sweetheart. It's all right.

name: Harry Potter
line: Ow!

name: Vernon Dursley
line: What happened?!

name: Harry Potter
line: I swear I don't know! One minute, the glass was there and then it was gone! It was like magic!

line: There's no such thing as magic!

line: Go away, ahh!

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Dry up, Dursley, you great prune.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Boy, I haven't seen you since you was a baby, Harry, but you're a bit more along than I would have expected. Particularly 'round the middle!

line: I-I-I'm not Harry.

name: Harry Potter
line: I-I am.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Oh, well, of course you are! Got something for ya. 'Fraid I might have sat on it at some point! I imagine that it'll taste just the same. Ahh. Baked it myself. Words and all. Heh.

name: Harry Potter
line: Thank you!

name: Harry Potter
line: Excuse me, who are you?

line: Rubeus Hagrid. Keeper of keys and grounds at Hogwarts. Course, you'll know all about Hogwarts.

name: Harry Potter
line: Sorry, no.

name: Harry Potter
line: Learned what?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: You're a wizard, Harry.

name: Harry Potter

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: A wizard. And a thumping good one at that, I'd wager. Once you train up a little.

name: Harry Potter
line: No, you've made a mistake. I can't be… a-a wizard. I mean, I'm just… Harry. Just Harry.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Well, just Harry. Did you ever make anything happen? Anything you couldn't explain when you were angry or scared? Ah.

name: Harry Potter
line: Dear, Mr. Potter. We are pleased to inform you that you have been accepted at Hogwarts' School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

name: Vernon Dursley
line: He'll not be going! We swore when we took him in, we'd put a stop to this rubbish!

name: Harry Potter
line: You knew? You know all along and you never told me?

name: Petunia Dursley
line: Of course we knew. How could you not be? My perfect sister being who she was. Oh, my mother and father were so proud the day she got her letter. We have a witch in the family. Isn't it wonderful? I was the only one to see her for what she was. A freak! And then she met that Potter, and then she had you, and I knew you'd be just the same, just as strange, just as... abnormal. And then, if you please, she went and got herself blown up. And we got landed with you.

name: Harry Potter
line: Blown up? You told me my parents died in a car crash!

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: A car crash? A car crash kill Lily and James Potter?

name: Petunia Dursley
line: We had to tell him something.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: It's an outrage! It's a scandal!

name: Vernon Dursley
line: He'll not be going! We swore when we took him in, we'd put a stop to this rubbish!

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Oh, and I suppose a great Muggle like yourself's going to stop him, are you?

name: Harry Potter
line: Muggle?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Non magic folk. This boy's had his name down ever since he was born! He's going to the finest school of witchcraft and wizardry in the world, and he'll be under the finest headmaster that Hogwarts has ever seen: Albus Dumbledore.

name: Vernon Dursley
line: I will not pay for some crackpot old fool to teach him magic tricks!

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Never, insult Albus Dumbledore, in front of me.

name: Dudley Dursley
line: Ahh!

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Oh, um, I'd appreciate if you didn’t tell anyone at Hogwarts about that. Strictly speaking, I'm not allowed to do magic.

name: Harry Potter
line: Okay.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Ooh, we're a bit behind schedule. Best be off. Unless you'd rather stay, of course! Hmm?

name: Harry Potter
line: All students must be equipped with… one standard size two pewter cauldron, and may bring if they desire, either an owl, a cat or a toad. Could we find all this in London?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: If you know where to go.

name: Tom
line: Ah, Hagrid! The usual, I presume?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: No thanks, Tom. I'm on official Hogwarts business today. Just helping young Harry here buy his school supplies.

name: Tom
line: Bless my soul. It's Harry Potter.

name: Doris Crockford

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Hello, Professor. I didn't see you there. Harry, this is Professor Quirrell. He'll be your Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher at Hogwarts.

name: Harry Potter
line: Oh, nice to meet you.

name: Quirinus Quirrell

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Yes, well, must be going now. Lots to buy. Heh.

name: Harry Potter
line: Goodbye.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: See, Harry, you're famous!

name: Harry Potter
line: But why am I famous, Hagrid? All those people back there, how is it they know who I am?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: I'm not exactly sure I'm the right person to tell you that, Harry. Welcome, Harry, to Diagon Alley. Here's where you'll get your quills and ink, and over there all your bits and bobs for doing your wizardry.

name: Harry Potter
line: But, Hagrid, how am I to pay for all this? I haven't any money.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Well, there's your money, Harry. Gringotts, the Wizard Bank. Aint no place safer, 'cept perhaps Hogwarts.

name: Harry Potter
line: Uh, Hagrid, what exactly are these things?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: They're goblins, Harry. Clever as they come goblins, but not the most friendly of beasts. Best stick close to me. Mr. Harry Potter wishes to make a withdrawal.

name: Goblin
line: And does Mr. Harry Potter have his key?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Oh. Wait a minute. Got it here somewhere. Hah. There's the little devil. Oh, and there's something else as well. Professor Dumbledore gave me this. It's about you-know-what in vault you-know-which.

name: Goblin
line: Very well.

name: Griphook
line: Vault six-hundred-and-eighty-seven. Lamp, please. Key, please.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Didn't think your mum and dad would leave you with nothing now, did ya?

name: Griphook
line: Vault seven-hundred-and-thirteen.

name: Harry Potter
line: What's in there, Hagrid?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Can't tell you, Harry. It's Hogwarts business. Very secret.

name: Griphook
line: Stand back.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Best not mention this to anyone, Harry.

name: Harry Potter
line: I still need… a wand.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: A wand? Well, you'll want Ollivanders. Ain't no place better. Run along there, but wait. I just got one more thing I got to do. Won't be long.

name: Harry Potter
line: Hello? Hello?

name: Garrick Ollivander
line: I wondered when I'd be seeing you, Mr. Potter. It seems only yesterday that your mother and father were in here buying their first wands. Ah. Here we are. Well, give it a wave. Apparently not. Perhaps this. No, no, definitely not! No matter... I wonder. Curious, very curious

name: Harry Potter
line: Sorry, but what’s curious?

name: Garrick Ollivander
line: I remember every wand I've ever sold, Mr. Potter. It just so happens that the phoenix, whose tail feather resides in your wand gave another feather, just one. It is curious that you should be destined for this wand when its brother gave you that scar.

name: Harry Potter
line: And… who owned that wand?

name: Garrick Ollivander
line: Oh, we do not speak his name. The wand chooses the wizard, Mr. Potter. It's not always clear why, but I think it is clear that we can expect great things from you. After all, He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named did great things… terrible, yes, but great.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Harry! Harry! Happy birthday!

name: Harry Potter
line: Wow.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: You all right, Harry? Seem very quiet.

name: Harry Potter
line: He killed my parents, didn't he? The one who gave me this. You know, Hagrid, I know you do.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: First, and understand this, Harry, 'cause it's very important, not all wizards are good. Some of them go bad. A few years ago, there was one wizard who went as bad as you can go. And his name was V-…his name was V-...

name: Harry Potter
line: Maybe if you wrote it down?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: No, I can't spell it. All right. Voldemort.

name: Harry Potter
line: Voldemort?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Sshh! It was dark times, Harry, dark times. Voldemort started to gather some followers, brought 'em over to the dark side. Anyone that stood up to him ended up dead. Your parents fought against him, but nobody lived once he decided to kill 'em. Nobody…not one. 'Cept you.

name: Harry Potter
line: Me? Voldemort tried to kill… me?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Yes. That ain't no ordinary cut on your forehead, Harry. A mark like that only comes from being touched by a curse… and an evil curse at that.

name: Harry Potter
line: What happened to…to You-Know-Who?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Well, some say he died. Codswallop in my opinion. Nope, I reckon he's out there, still, too tired to go on. But one thing's absolutely certain. Something about you stumped him that night. That's why you're famous. That's why everybody knows your name. You're the boy who lived.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: What're you looking at? Blimey, is that the time? Sorry, Harry, I'm gonna have to leave you. Dumbledore'll be wanting his- well, he'll be wanting to see me. Now, uh, your train leaves in ten minutes. Here's your ticket. Stick to it, Harry that's very important. Stick to your ticket.

name: Harry Potter

line: Good luck.

line: Excuse me, do you mind? Everywhere else is full.

line: It's just a spell. Besides, it's the cards you want. Each pack's got a famous witch or wizard. I got about five-hundred myself. Watch it! Oh, that's rotten luck. They've only got one good jump in them to begin with.

line: I got about six of him.

line: Well, you can't expect him to hang around all day, can you? This is Scabbers by the way, pathetic isn't he?

name: Harry Potter

line: Are you sure that's a real spell? Well, it's not very good, is it? Of course I've only tried a few simple spells myself, and they've all worked for me. For example… Oculus Reparo. That's better, isn't it? Holy Cricket, you're Harry Potter! I'm Hermione Granger, and you are..?

name: Ron Weasley
line: I'm… Ron Weasley.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Pleasure. You two better change into your robes. I expect we'll be arriving soon. You've got dirt, on your nose, by the way, did you know? Just there.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Right, then! First years! This way, please! Come on, now, don't be shy! Come on now, hurry up!

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Hello, Harry.

name: Harry Potter
line: Hey, Hagrid.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Whoa!

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: Welcome to Hogwarts. Now, in a few moments, you will pass through these doors and join your classmates. But before you can take your seats, you must be sorted into your houses. Any rule breaking, and you will lose points. At the end of the year, the house with the most points is awarded the house cup.

line: Trevor! Sorry.

line: I have a few start of term notices I wish to announce. The first years please note that the Dark Forest is strictly forbidden to all students. name: Harry Potter
line: Norbert?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Yeah, well, he's got to have a name, doesn't he? Don't you, Norbert?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Ohh! Ohh, ohh, oh, well… he'll have to be trained up a bit, of course. Who's that?

name: Harry Potter
line: Malfoy.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Oh dear.

name: Harry Potter
line: Hagrid always wanted a dragon. He told me so the first time I met him.

name: Ron Weasley
line: It's crazy. And worse, Malfoy knows.

name: Harry Potter
line: I don't understand. Is that bad?

name: Ron Weasley
line: It's bad.

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: Good evening.

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: Nothing, I repeat, nothing gives a student the right to walk about the school at night. Therefore, as punishment for your actions, fifty points will be taken.

name: Harry Potter
line: Fifty?!

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: Each. And to ensure it doesn't happen again, all four of you will receive detention.

name: Draco Malfoy
line: Excuse me, Professor. Perhaps I heard you wrong. I thought you said the four of us.

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: No, you heard me correctly, Mr. Malfoy. You see as honorable as your intentions were, you too were out of bed after hours. You will serve detention with your classmates.

name: Argus Filch
line: A pity they let the old punishments die. There was a time detention would find you hanging by your thumbs in the dungeons. God I miss the screaming. You'll be serving detention with Hagrid tonight. He's got a little job to do inside the dark forest. A sorry lot this, Hagrid. Oh, good God, man, you're not still on about that bloody dragon.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Norbert's gone. Dumbledore sent him off to Romania to live in a colony.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Well, that's good, isn't it? He'll be with his own kind.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Yeah, but what if he don't like Romania? What if the other dragons are mean to him? He's only a baby after all.

name: Argus Filch
line: Oh, for God's sake, pull yourself together, man. You're going into the forest after all. Got to have your wits about you.

name: Draco Malfoy
line: The forest? I thought that was a joke! We can't go in there! Students aren't allowed. And there are… werewolves!

name: Argus Filch
line: There's more than werewolves in those trees, lad. You can be sure of that. Nighty-night.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Right. Let's go.

name: Harry Potter
line: Hagrid, what's that?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: What we're here for. See that? That's unicorn's blood, that is. I found one dead a few weeks ago. Now, this one's been injured bad by something. So, it's our job to find the poor beast. Ron, Hermione, you'll come with me.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Okay.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: And Harry, you'll go with Malfoy.

name: Draco Malfoy
line: Okay. Then I get Fang!

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Fine. Just so you know, he's a bloody coward.

name: Draco Malfoy
line: You wait 'til my father hears about this. This is servant's stuff.

name: Harry Potter
line: If I didn't know better, Draco, I'd say you were scared.

name: Draco Malfoy
line: Scared, Potter? Did you hear that? Come on, Fang. Scared.

name: Harry Potter
line: What is it, Fang?

name: Draco Malfoy
line: HELP!!!!!

name: Firenze
line: Harry Potter, you must leave. You are known to many creatures here. The forest is not safe at this time. Especially for you.

name: Harry Potter
line: But what was that thing you saved me from?

name: Firenze
line: A monstrous creature. It is a terrible crime to slay a unicorn. Drinking the blood of a unicorn will keep you alive even if you are an inch from death. But at a terrible price. You have slain something so pure that the moment the blood touches your lips, you will have a half-life. A cursed life.

name: Harry Potter
line: But who would choose such a life?

name: Firenze
line: Can you think of no one?

name: Harry Potter
line: Do you mean to say… that thing that killed the unicorn… that was drinking its blood…that was Voldemort?

name: Firenze
line: Do you know what is hidden in the school at this very moment?

name: Harry Potter
line: The Philosopher's Stone.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Harry!

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Hello there, Firenze. I see you've met our young Mr. Potter. You all right there, Harry?

name: Firenze
line: Harry Potter, this is where I leave you. You're safe now. Good luck.

name: Hermione Granger
line: You mean You-Know-Who's out there right now, in the forest?

name: Harry Potter
line: But he's weak. He's living off the unicorns. Don't you see? We had it wrong! Snape doesn't want the Stone for himself. He wants the Stone for Voldemort. With the Elixir of Life, Voldemort will be strong again. He'll… he'll come back.

name: Ron Weasley
line: But, if he comes back, you don't think he'll try to… kill you, do you?

name: Harry Potter
line: I think if he'd had the chance, he might've tried to kill me tonight.

name: Ron Weasley
line: And to think, I've been worrying about my Potions final.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Hang on a minute. We're forgetting one thing. Who's the one wizard Voldemort always feared? Dumbledore. As long as Dumbledore's around, Harry, you're safe. As long as Dumbledore's around, you can't be touched.

name: Hermione Granger
line: I'd always heard Hogwarts end of year exams were frightful, but I found they're rather enjoyable.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Speak for yourself. All right there Harry?

name: Harry Potter
line: My scar. It keeps burning.

name: Hermione Granger
line: It's happened before.

name: Harry Potter
line: Not like this.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Perhaps you should see the nurse.

name: Harry Potter
line: I think it's a warning. It means danger's coming.

name: Harry Potter
line: Oh. Of course.

name: Hermione Granger
line: What is it?

name: Harry Potter
line: Don't you think it's a bit odd that what Hagrid wants more than anything is a dragon and a stranger turns up who just happens to have one? I mean, how many people wander around with dragon eggs in their pocket? Why didn't I see it before?

name: Harry Potter
line: Hagrid, who gave you the dragon egg? What did he look like?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: I dunno. I never saw his face. He kept his hood up.

name: Harry Potter
line: This stranger though, you and he must have talked?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Well, he- he wanted to know what sort of creatures I looked after. I told him, I said after Fluffy, a dragon's gonna be no problem.

name: Harry Potter
line: Did he seem interested in Fluffy?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Well, of course he was interested in Fluffy. How often do you come across a three-headed dog, even if you're in the trade? But I told him, I said, I said, the trick with any beast is to know how to calm him. Take Fluffy for example, just play him a bit of music and he'll fall straight to sleep. I shouldn't have told you that. Where you going? Wait! Wait!

name: Harry Potter
line: We have to see Professor Dumbledore, immediately!

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: I'm afraid Professor Dumbledore is not here. He received an urgent owl from the Ministry of Magic and left immediately for London.

name: Harry Potter
line: He's gone? But this is important! This is about the Philosopher's Stone.

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: How do you know-?

name: Harry Potter
line: Someone's going to try and steal it.

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: I don't know how you three found out about the Stone, but I assure you it is perfectly well protected. Now, would you go back to your dormitories? Quietly.

name: Harry Potter
line: That was no stranger Hagrid met in the village. It was Snape, which means he knows how to get past Fluffy.

name: Hermione Granger
line: And with Dumbledore gone-

name: Severus Snape
line: Good afternoon. Now what would three young Gryffindors such as yourselves be doing inside on a day like this?

name: Hermione Granger
line: Uh, uh, w-w-we were just-

name: Severus Snape
line: You ought to be careful. People will think you're…up to something.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Now what do we do?

name: Harry Potter
line: We go down the trapdoor, tonight.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Trevor. Trevor, sshh, go! You shouldn't be here!

name: Neville Longbottom
line: Neither should you. You're sneaking out again, aren't you?

name: Harry Potter
line: No Neville, listen. We were-

name: Neville Longbottom
line: No, I won't let you! You'll get Gryffindor into trouble again! I-I-I'll… fight you.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Neville, I'm really really sorry about this. Petrificus Totalus.

name: Ron Weasley
line: You're a little scary sometimes, you know that? Brilliant, but scary.

name: Harry Potter
line: Let's go. Sorry.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Sorry.

name: Ron Weasley
line: It's for your own good, you know.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Ow, you stood on my foot!

name: Ron Weasley
line: Sorry.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Alohomora.

name: Harry Potter
line: Wait a minute. He's… snoring. Snape's already been here. He's put a spell on the harp.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Eugh. It's got horrible breath.

name: Harry Potter
line: We have to move its paw.

name: Ron Weasley
line: What?

name: Harry Potter
line: Come on! Okay. Push.

name: Harry Potter
line: I'll go first. Don't follow until I give you a sign. If something bad happens, get yourselves out. Does it seem a bit… quiet to you?

name: Hermione Granger
line: The harp. It's stopped playing.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Euuugh! Yuck! Eugh.

name: Harry Potter
line: Jump!!

name: Ron Weasley
line: Ahhhhhhh!! Wow. Lucky this plant thing's here, really.

name: Harry Potter
line: Wow! Oh, ah!

name: Hermione Granger
line: Stop moving, both of you. This is Devil's Snare. You have to relax. If you don't, it will only kill you faster.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Kill us faster? Oh, now I can relax! Hermione!

name: Harry Potter
line: Hermione!

name: Ron Weasley
line: Now what are we gonna do?

name: Hermione Granger
line: Just relax!

name: Harry Potter
line: Hermione, where are you?

name: Hermione Granger
line: Do what I say! Trust me!

name: Ron Weasley
line: Ahhhhh!! Harry! Harry!

name: Hermione Granger
line: Are you okay?

name: Harry Potter
line: Yeah, yeah, I'm fine.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Ahhhh! Help!

name: Hermione Granger
line: He's not relaxing, is he?

name: Harry Potter
line: Apparently not.

name: Hermione Granger
line: We've gotta do something!

name: Harry Potter
line: What?

name: Hermione Granger
line: Eugh, I remember reading something in Herbology. Um, Devil's Snare, Devil's Snare. It's deadly fun, but will sulk in the Sun. That's IT! Devil's Snare hates sunlight! Lumus Solem.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Ahhhhhhhhh!

name: Harry Potter
line: Ron, you okay?

name: Ron Weasley
line: Yeah.

name: Harry Potter
line: Okay.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Phew! Lucky we didn't panic.

name: Harry Potter
line: Lucky Hermione pays attention in Herbology.

name: Hermione Granger
line: What is that?

name: Harry Potter
line: I don't know. Sounds like wings.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Curious. I've never seen birds like these.

name: Harry Potter
line: They're not birds. They're keys. And I bet one of them fits that door.

name: Hermione Granger
line: What's this all about?

name: Harry Potter
line: I don't know. Strange.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Alohomora! Well, it was worth a try.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Eugh! What are we going to do? There must be a thousand keys up there.

name: Ron Weasley
line: We want a big, old-fashioned one. Probably rusty, like the handle.

name: Harry Potter
line: There! I see it! The one with the broken wing!

name: Hermione Granger
line: What's wrong, Harry?

name: Harry Potter
line: It's too simple.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Oh go on Harry! If Snape can catch it on that old broomstick, you can. You're the youngest Seeker in a century!

name: Ron Weasley
line: This complicates things a bit.

name: Harry Potter
line: Catch the key!

name: Ron Weasley
line: Hurry up!

name: Hermione Granger
line: I don't like this. I don't like this at all.

name: Harry Potter
line: Where are we? A graveyard?

name: Ron Weasley
line: This is no graveyard. It's a chessboard.

name: Harry Potter
line: There's the door.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Now what do we do?

name: Ron Weasley
line: It's obvious, isn't it? We've got to play our way across the room. All right, Harry, you take the empty bishop's square. Hermione, you'll be the queen-side castle. And as for me, I'll be a knight.

name: Hermione Granger
line: What happens now?

name: Ron Weasley
line: Well, white moves first. And then…we play.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Ron, you don't suppose this is going to be like… real wizard's chess, do you?

name: Ron Weasley
line: You there, D-5! Yes Hermione, I think this is going to be… exactly like wizard chess.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Castle to E-4! Pawn to C-3!

name: Harry Potter
line: Wait a minute.

name: Ron Weasley
line: You understand right, Harry. Once I make my move, the queen will take me. Then you're free to check the king.

name: Harry Potter
line: No, Ron, no!

name: Hermione Granger
line: What is it?

name: Harry Potter
line: He's going to sacrifice himself.

name: Hermione Granger
line: No you can't! There must be another way!

name: Ron Weasley
line: Do you wanna stop Snape from getting that stone or not? Harry, it's you that has to go on. I know it. Not me. Not Hermione. You. Knight to H-3. Check

name: Harry Potter
line: Ron! No! Don't move! Don't forget, we're still playing. Checkmate

name: Harry Potter
line: Take care of Ron. Then go to the owlery, send a message to Dumbledore. Ron's right. I have to go on.

name: Hermione Granger
line: You'll be okay, Harry. You're a great wizard. You really are.

name: Harry Potter
line: Not as good as you.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Heh, me? Books and cleverness. There are more important things. Friendship and bravery. And Harry, just be careful.

name: Harry Potter
line: Ow! You? N-no, it can't be! Snape, h-he w-was the-

name: Quirinus Quirrell
line: Yes, he does seem the type, doesn't he? Next to him, who would suspect, p-p-poor s-s-s-stuttering Professor Quirrell?

name: Harry Potter
line: But that day, during the Quidditch match, Snape tried to kill me.

name: Quirinus Quirrell
line: No dear boy, I tried to kill you! And trust me, if Snape's cloak hadn't caught fire and broken my eye contact, I would have succeeded, even with Snape muttering his little countercurse.

name: Harry Potter
line: Snape was trying to save me?

name: Quirinus Quirrell
line: I knew you were a danger to me right from the off, especially after Halloween.

name: Harry Potter
line: Th-then you let the troll in!

name: Quirinus Quirrell
line: Very good, Potter, yes. Snape, unfortunately, wasn't fooled. While everyone else was running about the dungeon, he went to the third floor to head me off. He, of course, never trusted me again. He rarely left me alone. But he doesn't understand. I'm never alone. Never. Now, what does this mirror do? I see what I desire. I see myself holding the Stone. But how do I get it?

name: Voldemort
line: Use the boy.

name: Quirinus Quirrell
line: Come here, Potter! Now! Tell me, what do you see? What is it? What do you see?!

name: Harry Potter
line: I'm shaking hands with Dumbledore. I've won the house cup.

name: Voldemort
line: He lies.

name: Quirinus Quirrell
line: Tell the truth!! What do you see?!

name: Voldemort
line: Let me speak to him.

name: Quirinus Quirrell
line: Master, you are not strong enough.

name: Voldemort
line: I have strength enough for this. Harry Potter, we meet again.

name: Harry Potter
line: Voldemort.

name: Voldemort
line: Yes, you see what I've become? See what I must do to survive? Live off another, a mere parasite. Unicorn blood can sustain me, but it cannot give me a body of my own. But there is something that can. Something that, conveniently enough, lies in your pocket. Stop him! Don't be a fool. Why suffer an horrific death, when you can join me, and live.

name: Harry Potter
line: Never!

name: Voldemort
line: Haha. Bravery. Your parents had it too. Tell me, Harry, would you like to see your mother and father again, together? We can bring them back. All I ask is for something in return. That's it, Harry. There is no good and evil, there is only power, and those too weak to see it. Together, we'll do extraordinary things. Just give me the stone.

name: Harry Potter
line: You liar!

name: Voldemort
line: Kill him!

name: Quirinus Quirrell
line: Ahhh, ah ah, ahhhhhhh! What is this magic?

name: Voldemort
line: Fool! Get the stone!

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Good afternoon, Harry. Tokens from your admirers?

name: Harry Potter
line: Admirers?

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: What happened down in the dungeons beterrn you and Professor Quirrell is a complete secret. So naturally the whole school knows. I see that your friend Ronald has saved you the trouble of opening your chocolate frogs.

name: Harry Potter
line: Ron was here? Is he all right? What about Hermione?

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Fine. They're both just fine.

name: Harry Potter
line: But what happened to the Stone?

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Relax, dear boy. The Stone has been destroyed. My friend Nicholas and I have had a little chat, and agreed it was best all around.

name: Harry Potter
line: But then Flamel, he'll die, won't he?

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: He has enough Elixir to set his affairs in order. But yes, he will die.

name: Harry Potter
line: How is it I got the stone, sir? One minute I was staring in the mirror and-

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Ah. You see, only a person who wanted to find the Stone, but not use it, would be able to get it. That is one of my more brilliant ideas. And between you and me that is saying something.

name: Harry Potter
line: Does that mean, with the Stone gone, that is, that Voldemort can never come back?

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Ah, I'm afraid there are ways in which he can return. Harry, do you know why Professor Quirrell couldn't bear to have you touch him? It was because of your mother. She sacrificed herself for you, and that kind of act leaves a mark. No, no, this kind of mark cannot be seen. It lives in your very skin.

name: Harry Potter
line: What is it?

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Love, Harry, love. Ah. Bertie Bott's Every Flavour Beans. I was most unfortunate in my youth to come across a vomit flavoured one, and since then I'm afraid I have lost my liking for them. But I think I could be safe with a nice toffee… Mm… Alas. Earwax.

name: Harry Potter
line: All right there, Ron?

name: Ron Weasley
line: All right. You?

name: Harry Potter
line: All right. Hermione?

name: Hermione Granger
line: Never better.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Another year, gone! And now, as I understand it, the house cup needs awarded and the points stand thus. In fourth place, Gryffindor, with 312 points! In third place, Hufflepuff, with 352 points! Second, Ravenclaw, with 426 points! And in first place, with 472 points, Slytherin house! Yes, well done Slytherin, well done Slytherin. However, recent events must be taken into account and I have a few last minute points to award. To Miss Hermione Granger, for the cool use of intellect while others were in grave peril, fifty points! Second, to Mr. Ronald Weasley, for the best played game of chess that Hogwarts has seen these many years, fifty points! And third, to Mr. Harry Potter, for pure love and outstanding courage, I award Gryffindor house, sixty points!

name: Hermione Granger
line: We're tied with Slytherin!

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: And finally, it takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to your enemies, but a great deal more to stand up to your friends. I award ten points to Neville Longbottom! Assuming my calculations are correct, I believe that a change of decoration is in order! Gryffindor wins the House Cup!

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Come on now, hurry up, you'll be late! Train's leaving. Go on. Come on, hurry up!

name: Hermione Granger
line: Come on, Harry.

name: Harry Potter
line: One minute.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Thought you were leaving without sayin' goodbye, did ya? This is for you.

name: Harry Potter
line: Thanks, Hagrid.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Go on. On with you, on with you now. Oh, now listen Harry, if that dope of a cousin of yours, Dudley, gives you any grief, you could always threaten him with a nice pair of ears to go with that tail of his.

name: Harry Potter
line: But Hagrid, we're not allowed to do magic away from Hogwarts. You know that.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: I do, but your cousin don't, do he? Eh? Hmmhmm

name: Hermione Granger
line: Feels strange to be going home, doesn't it?

name: Harry Potter
line: I'm not going home, not really.
